chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
V: UniformSpace
U: UniformSpace
c: UniformSpace.sort V
x: UniformSpace.sort U

Goal:
continuous (fun _ : U => c) x

Premises:
continuous = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (f : T -> U) (x : T) => filterlim f (locally x) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> U) -> T -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope _]
Notation UniformSpace := UniformSpace
AbelianGroup.sort = fun t : AbelianGroup => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : AbelianGroup -> Type AbelianGroup.sort is a coercion
UniformSpace.sort = fun t : UniformSpace => let (sort, _, _) := t in sort : UniformSpace -> Type UniformSpace.sort is a coercion
continuous_comp_2 : forall (f : ?U -> ?V) (g : ?U -> ?W) (h : ?V -> ?W -> ?X) (x0 : ?U), continuous f x0 -> continuous g x0 -> continuous (fun x1 : ?V * ?W => h (fst x1) (snd x1)) (f x0, g x0) -> continuous (fun x : ?U => h (f x) (g x)) x0 where ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?V : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?W : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?X : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
continuous_comp : forall (f : ?U -> ?V) (g : ?V -> ?W) (x0 : ?U), continuous f x0 -> continuous g (f x0) -> continuous (fun x : ?U => g (f x)) x0 where ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?V : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?W : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
continuous_ext_loc : forall (f g : ?T -> ?U) (x0 : ?T), locally x0 (fun y : ?T => g y = f y) -> continuous g x0 -> continuous f x0 where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]

filter_prod_proper = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (F : (T1 -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (T2 -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter F) (FG : ProperFilter G) => {| filter_ex := fun (P : T1 * T2 -> Prop) (H : filter_prod F G P) => match H with | @Filter_prod _ _ _ _ _ Q1 Q2 H1 H2 HP => (fun _evar_0_ : forall (x : T1) (p : (fun x0 : T1 => Q1 x0) x), (fun _ : exists x0 : T1, Q1 x0 => exists x0 : T1 * T2, P x0) (ex_intro (fun x0 : T1 => Q1 x0) x p) => match filter_ex Q1 H1 as e return ((fun _ : exists x : T1, Q1 x => exists x : T1 * T2, P x...
open_false = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (Hx : False) => False_ind (locally x (fun _ : T => False)) Hx : forall T : UniformSpace, open (fun _ : T => False) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted
closed_true = fun (T : UniformSpace) (_tmp : T) (_ : ~ locally _tmp (fun _ : T => ~ True)) => I : forall T : UniformSpace, closed (fun _ : T => True) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted
continuous_ext : forall (f g : ?T -> ?U) (x0 : ?T), (forall x1 : ?T, f x1 = g x1) -> continuous f x0 -> continuous g x0 where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
is_lim_comp_continuous : forall (f g : R -> R) (x : Rbar) (l : R), is_lim f x l -> continuous g l -> is_lim (fun x0 : R => g (f x0)) x (g l)
continuous_snd : forall (x0 : ?U) (y : ?V), continuous snd (x0, y) where ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?V : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
continuous_fst : forall (x0 : ?U) (y : ?V), continuous fst (x0, y) where ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?V : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
closed_false = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (Hx : ~ locally x (fun _ : T => ~ False)) => Hx (ex_intro (fun eps : posreal => forall y : T, ball x eps y -> ~ False) {| pos := 1; cond_pos := Rlt_0_1 |} (fun (H : T) (_ : ball x {| pos := 1; cond_pos := Rlt_0_1 |} H) (H1 : False) => unkeyed match H1 return False with end)) : forall T : UniformSpace, closed (fun _ : T => False) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted
filterlim_const : forall a : ?U, filterlim (fun _ : ?T => a) ?F (locally a) where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- Type] ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?F : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- Filter ?F]
prod_ball = fun (U V : UniformSpace) (x : U * V) (eps : R) (y : U * V) => ball (fst x) eps (fst y) /\ ball (snd x) eps (snd y) : forall U V : UniformSpace, U * V -> R -> U * V -> Prop Arguments U, V are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ _ R_scope _]
closed_filterlim = fun (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (FF : ProperFilter' F) (f : T -> U) (D : U -> Prop) (y : U) (Ffy : filterlim f F (locally y)) (Df : forall x : T, D (f x)) => closed_filterlim_loc f D y Ffy (filter_forall (fun x : T => D (f x)) Df) : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter' F -> forall (f : T -> U) (D : U -> Prop) (y : U), filterlim f F (locally y) -> (forall x : T, D (f x)) -> closed D -> D y Arguments T, U, F, FF are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ function_scope _ function_scope function_scope _ _ function_scope _]
open_true = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) (_ : True) => filter_true : forall T : UniformSpace, open (fun _ : T => True) Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted
continuous_continuous_on : forall (D : ?T -> Prop) (f : ?T -> ?U) (x0 : ?T), locally x0 D -> continuous_on D f -> continuous f x0 where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
continuous_on_forall : forall (D : ?T -> Prop) (f : ?T -> ?U), (forall x0 : ?T, D x0 -> continuous f x0) -> continuous_on D f where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace] ?U : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
Record ProperFilter' (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter' { filter_not_empty : ~ F (fun _ : T => False); filter_filter' : Filter F } For ProperFilter': Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter': Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter': Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ _]
locally' = fun (T : UniformSpace) (x : T) => within (fun y : T => y <> x) (locally x) : forall T : UniformSpace, T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
open_not : forall D : ?T -> Prop, closed D -> open (fun x : ?T => ~ D x) where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
closed_not : forall D : ?T -> Prop, open D -> closed (fun x : ?T => ~ D x) where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
continuous_on = fun (T U : UniformSpace) (D : T -> Prop) (f : T -> U) => forall x : T, D x -> filterlim f (within D (locally x)) (locally (f x)) : forall T U : UniformSpace, (T -> Prop) -> (T -> U) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope function_scope]
locally_locally : forall (x0 : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x0 P -> locally x0 (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
open_or : forall D E : ?T -> Prop, open D -> open E -> open (fun x : ?T => D x \/ E x) where ?T : [U : UniformSpace V : UniformSpace c : V x : U |- UniformSpace]
